source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a scenic, wide shot of a large marina on a calm, overcast day. The camera slowly pans and zooms out, revealing a modern building on the water, rows of covered boat slips, and a distant city skyline across the bay. There is no significant subject motion within the tranquil scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
The camera movement is a gradual forward and upward motion combined with a zoom-out, rather than a pan.
 a distant city skyline on the right side of frame, not  across the bay
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The camera movement is a gradual forward and upward motion combined with a zoom-out, rather than a pan. Additionally, the distant city skyline is located on the right side of the frame, not across the bay.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The camera movement is a gradual forward and upward motion combined with a zoom-out, rather than a pan. Additionally, the distant city skyline is located on the right side of the frame, not across the bay.
